mapper.select: INSERT INTO reply (rno, boardnumber, replytext, userid, secretreply, replyer) VALUES (#{rno}, #{boardnumber}, #{replytext}, #{userid}, #{secretreply}, #{replyer})
mapper.sql: SELECT r.rno,r.boardnumber,r.replytext,r.replyer,r.secretreply,r.userid FROM board b, reply r WHERE b.boardnumber=r.boardnumber
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT r.rno,r.boardnumber,r.replytext,r.replyer,r.secretreply,r.userid FROM board b, reply r WHERE b.boardnumber=r.boardnumber AND b.boardnumber=#{boardnumber} ) A LIMIT #{PAGE_SCALE} OFFSET #{start}-1
